Incredible restaurant experience! From ringing a doorbell to gain admittance, the ambiance makes you feel like you're in a really beautiful home or even castle or mansion with antiques everywhere and beautiful decor. Loved so much about this dining experience: wait staff, BYOB with no problem; sharing plates--- for every appetizer or entree one person ordered, an "extra" portion was placed on the table for the other five of us to taste!  Loved meeting Mr. And Mrs Greco as we were leaving. Great experience though some of the cream sauces started tasting the same, but maybe we ordered too many cream sauce dishes.
